resources.string: This app provides weather forecasts for various locations around the world. It fetches data from the BBC weather RSS feeds and displays the information in a user-friendly manner.

The app displays a 3-day weather forecast, current weather observations, and additional details like humidity, wind speed, and weather icons. üå©Ô∏è üåßÔ∏è It also provides a graphical representation of the weather conditions using icons and maps.
The weather data is sourced from the BBC Weather RSS feeds, which provide reliable and up-to-date information for locations worldwide.
The app automatically updates the weather data when it starts and at regular intervals set by the user, with a default schedule of 8:00 AM and 8:00 PM.
